body: @dss886 What are the repro steps for this?
@gpeal Actually I don't know…it is one of the crash logs after I published my app.
@gpeal @dss886 this exception also caught by crash-platform in my app.

How common is the crash?

On Tue, Sep 5, 2017, 12:28 AM SwayChen <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> @gpeal <https://github.com/gpeal> @dss886 <https://github.com/dss886>
> this exception also caught by crash-platform in my app.
>
> —
> You are receiving this because you were mentioned.
> Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub
> <https://github.com/airbnb/lottie-android/issues/452#issuecomment-327094497>,
> or mute the thread
> <https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe-auth/ABP0YY5ezaRFBpHc6toLBTLmDGMNgqXrks5sfPgzgaJpZM4PLm4B>
> .
>
@gpeal About 4-5 crash per day in my case. The distribution of the system version is uniform from 5.0 to 7.1.
And this crash begin to happen after I upgraded Lottie to 2.2.0. The last version which is using Lottie 2.0.0 is ok.

We face the same one, ~250 crashes per day, it's the most common crash we have in production but we can't reproduce it. Same here, we are on 2.2.0 and it does not appear to be related to any specific device/OS.

Thanks. I'll look in to this asap.

On Tue, Sep 5, 2017, 1:12 AM moni890185 <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> We face the same one, ~250 crashes per day, it's the most common crash we
> have in production but we can't reproduce it. Same here, we are on 2.2.0
> and it does not appear to be related to any specific device/OS.

Hi, this Exception still exists on `2.2.1`
@SwayChen Can you post another stack trace?
